content: I think what you got to step back and remember, what's very different this time is it's â the fundamentals for single-family residential growth in our market still â they're still there. Just bigger picture, I know we're not guiding here, but if we turn to next year and you're getting double-digit growth, which is all price or price-led, you don't have another $100 million headwind from energy, let's say, you don't have a headwind there.
